name: @leomarlo/voting-registry-contracts
description: This package contains solidity contracts, abstract contracts and interfaces for a voting-registry and its inheritable template integrations.

scripts.compile-abi: solcjs --abi --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . -o compiler-output/abis votingContract/* extensions/*/* implementations/* registration/resolver/*/* registration/registry/* registration/registrar/*
scripts.compile-bin: solcjs --bin --include-path node_modules/ --base-path . -o compiler-output/bins votingContract/* extensions/*/* implementations/* registration/resolver/*/* registration/registry/* registration/registrar/*

author: Leonhard Horstmeyer <leonhard.horstmeyer@gmail.com>
